Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Doctor', 3: "Your younger brother requires immediate care. His condition will grow dire if he doesn't get a heart transplant as soon as possible.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: "Of course, I know about your situation... Finding a donor, the cost, and the queue... They're allâ€”What I'm trying to say is, you might want to be prepared.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Morian', 3: "Murray... Now's not the time for me to drown myself in research, at least... at least until I have the money for him.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Morian', 3: "In this world of tech monopoly, there are walls everywhere. Even with my CV sent through the system, it's not going to pass through the initial filtering...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teenager', 3: "I know you've been... wearing this the whole time, but what's with the getup?"}
{2: 'Morian', 3: 'Personal taste. Now cut the crap. Where\'s "Hyena"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teenager', 3: 'About thirty seconds southeast. Are you ready... Lee?'}
{2: 'Morian', 3: 'Thirty seconds is enough for a simple gun modification.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Morian', 3: "This is a necessary performance upgrade. We need to get rid of Hyena before they get close. I don't want to get my coat dirty...", 4: '1'}
